document_name: Empowering the Vulnerable Communities in Albania : Support to the Implementation of the National Strategy for Improving Roma Living Conditions
Empowering Vulnerable Local Communities Joint Programme

outputs.output_descr: The project will focus in three main areas: Support participation of vulnerable communities in local decision-making - through identification of priorities and preparation of Community Development Plans; implementation of community upgrading projects in partnership with local governments, strengthening capacities and cooperation between Roma and Egyptian NGOs and their respective communities;  enable vulnerable communities to access their rights, particularly access to public services through civil registration; community policing and strengthening network of Roma Mediators in areas of health, education, and child protection; facilitating vocational training and employment;  promote  policies and institutional strengthening for social inclusion of vulnerable communities  through  capacity building and assistance to local and central government institutions; capacity building and partnership strengthening for Roma and Egyptian NGOs.

project_descr: Empowering Vulnerable Local Communities of Albania
project_title: Empowering Vulnerable Local Communities of Albania
